name: requests-for-supermarketapi
description: Get requests from Supermarket API that returns an array of JSON.

scripts.standard: clear && node ./node_modules/.bin/mocha test test/Product test/Store test/StringOfItems
scripts.geographic: clear && node ./node_modules/.bin/mocha test test/originalResponse/geographic.js test/StoreCity/CitiesByState.js test/StoreState/AllUSStates.js
